name: Era of Crisis:Revolution
description:
1. Relive the classic plot and create the strongest lineup with popular heroes!
2. Rich collection of ninjas, allowing you to acquire various ninja combat skills!
3. All the ninjutsu is under your control, exploring the mystery of Ninja!
4. Challenge the classic BOSSES and get rich rewards.5. Freely explore all corners of the Naruto World, accept mission challenges, form the strongest ninja lineup and rule the ninja world!

Join the battle with your favorite ninja! Download 《Era of Crisis:Revolution》now!
